name: Mateoconfeugo.github.io
body:
### Welcome to my home on github

Like many of you I share a passion for creating software - it is such a cool thing we have available to us that didn't even exist that long ago.  So here are my expressions in code - stuff I've been working on.  Maybe it will be of interest to you.

The areas of software I am interested in an have included in my repositories deal with
* Dev Ops
* Clojure
* Single Page Web Application Design and Development
* Continuous Delivery
* Clojurescript
* Perl
* Embedded Linux
* Real Time Big Data
* Home Automation Stuff
* Javascript 
* C++
* Using Git as Technology
